query: I'm doing some market research and need to gather information from multiple sources. Could you pull the latest cryptocurrency news and discussions from Twitter using the ALL Crypto News Feed tool? I'd also like to look up details about a specific politician with the Goverlytics ID 437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190. Finally, can you check the Wall Street Journal through the BizToc news aggregator for their most recent business and finance articles?

tool_list.tool name: ALL Crypto News Feed: Get Twitter Feed
tool_list.tool description: Returns a Twitter feed focused on cryptocurrency topics. This endpoint delivers real-time tweets from the comprehensive crypto news aggregation service that collects information from various sources including social media, listing announcements, government regulatory updates, and influential crypto blogs. Access the latest conversations, market sentiment, and breaking news directly from Twitter's crypto community.

I'm interested in seeing how the same major events are being reported across these different international perspectives and languages.

tool_list.tool description: يسترجع الأخبار من موقع الجزيرة، وهو جزء من خدمة متكاملة تقدم آخر العناوين والروابط الإخبارية من أبرز المواقع الإخبارية العربية مثل الجزيرة، بي بي سي عربي، سي إن إن عربي، والعربية وغيرها. يتم تحديث البيانات وإضافة مصادر إخبارية جديدة بشكل مستمر، مما يضمن الحصول على أحدث المعلومات من المصادر الإخبارية العربية الرئيسية.

العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

While we're at it, I'm curious about which news sources are available - could you pull lists from both Moka News and NewsData, with a focus on English technology news sources? Oh, and I'd also like to check what Arabic content is accessible through Sky News Arabic.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves the complete list of Moka News categories, which is essential for subsequent queries targeting specific news categories. This endpoint leverages a comprehensive news scraping API that aggregates the latest news content from over 30 global sources (with plans to expand to hundreds of sources), refreshing every minute to ensure up-to-date information. Understanding the available categories allows for more precise filtering when accessing the continuously updated news database.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on entertainment news, particularly about superhero films. Could you help me explore what's happening with Marvel movies lately? I'd first like to see what news categories Moka News offers, and then specifically look up Marvel superhero updates through Kubric's movie news API. While we're at it, I'm curious about which news sources are available - could you pull lists from both Moka News and NewsData, with a focus on English technology news sources? Oh, and I'd also like to check what Arabic content is accessible through Sky News Arabic.
hard_rewrite: I'm planning a movie night with friends who are big comic book fans. I wonder what's currently trending in the superhero universe - particularly those films with characters in colorful costumes from that famous publisher with all the interconnected movies. Could you help me explore what kind of news information is available? I'm curious about what categories Moka organizes their news into. Then, I'd like to see what's happening with those popular superhero films - you know, the ones with Thor, Iron Man and that whole crew. Also, I'm putting together a media literacy project and need to understand which news outlets are accessible through different platforms - both the Moka system and that other one focused on data-driven news, particularly for English tech stories. As a final note, my Arabic-speaking colleague mentioned something about Sky News having content in Arabic - I'd be interested to see what kind of coverage they provide.

query: I'm trying to stay informed about international news, particularly from the Middle East and East Africa. Could you help me gather the latest headlines from Al Jazeera Arabic and pull some recent updates from CNN Arabic? I'd also like to check out what Hibapress is reporting on currently. Since I'm also interested in East African perspectives, could you find some news articles in Swahili? Lastly, I'm doing some research on the 2020 U.S. presidential election and would appreciate learning about key topics from both democratic and republican viewpoints.

واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

tool_list.tool name: Kenyan News Api: Get the news in swahili
tool_list.tool description: Returns news articles in Swahili language, providing access to current events and information specifically in this East African language. This service aggregates news content from various sources and delivers it in Swahili, allowing users to stay informed about local and global developments through content that's linguistically and culturally relevant to Swahili speakers. The tool bridges information gaps by making news accessible in one of Africa's most widely spoken languages.

Retrieves a list of key topics related to the 2020 U.S. presidential election. This endpoint taps into the Election API's comprehensive database of election news, events, important figures, and frequently asked questions, providing access to information that has been carefully tagged with both democratic and republican perspectives. task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: Retrieve recent news articles from multiple sources, including general global news from the Moka News service (which collects headlines from over 30 diverse news sources), the latest Greek news translated to English from various Greek media outlets, and comprehensive IPL cricket news coverage from worldwide sources.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay up-to-date with current events across different regions and interests. Could you pull some recent news articles from multiple sources for me? I'd like to see general global headlines from the Moka News service that aggregates from those 30+ diverse sources, as well as the latest Greek news that's been translated to English. Also, I'm following the IPL cricket season, so I'd appreciate comprehensive coverage of that from worldwide sources too.
hard_rewrite: I've been feeling out of touch with current events lately. I'd love to catch up on what's happening around the world right now - especially those major headlines everyone's talking about from various perspectives. Also, I'm particularly interested in what's happening in Greece these days, but my Greek is nonexistent. And as a cricket enthusiast, I've been missing updates on the IPL tournament that my friends keep discussing. Is there a way I could get caught up on all these areas without having to visit dozens of different websites?

query: I'm trying to catch up on current events across several areas I follow. Could you pull together recent news on cryptocurrency, including the latest blog posts? I'd also like to see what's happening with climate change globally, as well as check out the trending business topics and headlines from BizToc. While you're at it, could you include some recent BBC Arabic coverage, any news from Cameroon specifically related to climate or cryptocurrency, and the latest updates on the coronavirus situation worldwide?

I'm also interested in seeing a comprehensive overview of global LGBTQ+ news, as well as recent coverage about narco activity in Mexico. While you're at it, I'd love to check out the top articles from dev.to published this year. Also, can you share some financial news categories from Reuters? Finally, I'd appreciate seeing the latest headlines from Arabic news sources like Alarabiya and Hibapress.

simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on news across different sectors and regions. Could you pull up the latest business headlines from the United States? I'm also interested in seeing a comprehensive overview of global LGBTQ+ news, as well as recent coverage about narco activity in Mexico. While you're at it, I'd love to check out the top articles from dev.to published this year. Also, can you share some financial news categories from Reuters? Finally, I'd appreciate seeing the latest headlines from Arabic news sources like Alarabiya and Hibapress.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to keep up with current events from different perspectives. I'm particularly interested in how the American economy is performing right now. Also, there's been so much happening globally with equality movements - I'd love to catch up on those developments. I'm also concerned about the security situation south of the US border - any updates on that front? As a developer, I'm curious what content has been resonating most with the tech community this year. I should probably diversify my financial news sources too - what categories of financial reporting are available? And lastly, I've been trying to improve my Arabic - are there any current headlines from major Arabic news outlets that might help me practice my reading skills?

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: I need to explore various news sources across different domains. First, show me the latest articles from dev.to and also the top articles from this month on that platform. Then, retrieve the latest anime news list. Additionally, I'd like to see detailed content from Kompas (Indonesian news) using the specific GUID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178'. Please also fetch key topics related to the 2020 U.S. presidential election, the latest IPL cricket news, and the home page content from the Cameroon news service. Finally, show me AI-curated news specifically for the US region using version v1 of the service.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on news across different interests and regions. Could you help me browse through some articles from dev.to - both the latest ones and what's been popular this month? I'm also interested in checking out the most recent anime news. For my international news coverage, I'd like to read a specific article from Kompas, the Indonesian news site, using the GUID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178'. Also, can you pull up some key topics related to the 2020 U.S. presidential election and the latest updates on IPL cricket? I'd also appreciate seeing what's on the home page of the Cameroon news service. Lastly, could you show me some AI-curated news specifically for the US region using the v1 version of the service?
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to keep up with different information sources lately. I'm curious what developer community content is trending right now - both the freshest posts and what's been popular this month. Also, I'm a big anime fan and wondering what's happening in that world. I was reading an Indonesian article about flood prevention in Bandung with some interesting details (I think the article ID was something like .xml.2023.06.20.114935178). With the historical perspective in mind, I'd love to understand the key themes that emerged during the last U.S. presidential race. As a cricket enthusiast, I'm wondering what's been happening with the IPL lately. I'm also interested in news from Central Africa, particularly Cameroon. Finally, I'm curious how AI is curating news specifically for American audiences with their first-generation system.

query: I'm trying to stay up-to-date with global tech developments. Could you gather the latest technology news from around the world for me? I'd like to see articles from IEEE Spectrum, along with tech coverage from the US, Germany, and Japan. Also, please include top developer articles from dev.to. To round out my global perspective, I'd appreciate some international news sources too, specifically Philippine news and Arabic coverage from Hibapress. I'm really looking for a comprehensive worldwide overview of current technology trends and innovations.

tool_list.tool name: IEEE Spectrum API: Get the latest 30 News from IEEE Spectrum
tool_list.tool description: Returns the latest 30 news articles from IEEE Spectrum as JSON objects containing title, URL, publication date, section, image source, and estimated reading time. This endpoint leverages the IEEE Spectrum News API, a simple HTTP-based REST-like service that enables developers and students to access and integrate current technology news and articles from IEEE Spectrum into their websites, web applications, or mobile apps. The API operates via HTTP GET requests with header-encoded parameters and delivers responses in JSON format, making it easy to incorporate the latest technology news into your projects.

tool_list.tool name: dev-to-api: Get all the year's top articles
tool_list.tool description: Returns the top articles from the dev.to website for a specified year. This endpoint is part of an API that fetches blog content from dev.to, allowing users to access popular programming articles, tutorials, and discussions that received the highest engagement during a particular year. The service helps developers stay informed about trending topics and valuable resources in the software development community without having to manually search through the site's archives.

Just trying to get a sense of how technology is progressing worldwide.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different sectors. Could you pull the latest general news stories from BizToc's main page? I'm also interested in any narco-related news coming out of Mexico. While you're at it, would you mind checking Twitter for recent cryptocurrency updates? Finally, I'd like some background information on the key political figures from the 2020 US election.
hard_rewrite: I'm researching current events for a presentation. Could you help me understand what's happening in the world right now by checking what's trending on that business news aggregator site - the one with the main page that shows chronological updates? Also, I've been hearing concerning reports about the situation in Mexico related to those criminal organizations that control drug trafficking - any recent developments there? And speaking of trends, what are people saying on Twitter about digital currencies lately? Finally, I'm curious about what became of those key figures from that contentious presidential race a few years back - you know, the 2020 one. Who were the main players again?

query: I'm doing some research on cryptocurrency trends across different media. Could you help me gather the latest crypto news from various sources? I'd like to see specialized crypto blog posts, check out any business trending tags related to crypto, and find any movie news that mentions cryptocurrency. Also, I'm interested in how crypto is being covered in both US and international general news outlets, and please include any relevant 2020 election coverage from Election2020 Smartable that intersects with crypto. Basically, I'm looking for a comprehensive overview of how cryptocurrency is being discussed across different types of media right now.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: Get the latest cryptocurrency news from ALL Crypto News Feed's blog posts. Then show me trending tags from BizToc's main page. Search for movie news about cryptocurrency with a limit of 15 results. Also gather news from multiple sources including: India Today, Arabic news from Alarabiya, US regional news (v1), Election2020 future events (page 1), and developer articles from dev.to. I want to see a comprehensive overview of cryptocurrency coverage and general news across these different platforms.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing some research on cryptocurrency trends across different media. Could you help me gather the latest crypto news from various sources? I'd like to see specialized crypto blog posts, check out any business trending tags related to crypto, and find any movie news that mentions cryptocurrency. Also, I'm interested in how crypto is being covered in both US and international general news outlets, and please include any relevant 2020 election coverage from Election2020 Smartable that intersects with crypto. Basically, I'm looking for a comprehensive overview of how cryptocurrency is being discussed across different types of media right now.
hard_rewrite: I've been noticing digital currencies popping up in various media lately. Could you help me understand what's happening in this space by checking some specialized blog feeds about this topic? I'm also curious if any business trends are related to this phenomenon - perhaps there are popular tags that might reveal industry interest? I wonder if these digital assets have made their way into entertainment news too. And finally, I'd like to get a broader perspective on how this topic is being covered in general news both domestically and internationally.

query: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather information from diverse international sources. Could you help me collect news from Arabic outlets like Aljazeera, CNN Arabic, and Youm7 using the Arabic news API? I'd also like to compare the current COVID-19 statistics between Egypt and the United States from Coronavirus Smartable. While you're at it, please look up some English-language articles about Middle East politics from international sources (News Network), and find some news coverage in Swahili so I can understand the East African perspective via the Kenyan News Api. I'm curious about what's trending in tech too, so could you pull the top developer community articles from dev.to this month? Lastly, I need some historical context - can you retrieve information about the 2020 U.S. election from Election2020 Smartable, just focusing on the first page of results?

tool_list.tool description: يسترجع الأخبار من موقع الجزيرة، وهو جزء من خدمة متكاملة تقدم آخر العناوين والروابط الإخبارية من أبرز المواقع الإخبارية العربية مثل الجزيرة، بي بي سي عربي، سي إن إن عربي، والعربية وغيرها. يتم تحديث البيانات وإضافة مصادر إخبارية جديدة بشكل مستمر، مما يضمن الحصول على أحدث المعلومات من المصادر الإخبارية العربية الرئيسية.

سيطرت -اليوم السبت- على المنشآت العسكرية في مقاطعة روستوف (جنوبي البلاد) وهدد بالتوجه للعاصمة موسكو، وذلك في تحرك يستهدف الإطاحة بالقيادة العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

tool_list.tool description: Searches for news articles based on a specified keyword, retrieving relevant results from a global network of news sources. This tool connects you to a comprehensive international news database, allowing you to find current events, stories, and media coverage matching your search terms. For a demonstration of the search capabilities and coverage, you can visit the demo site at https://core-api.net/news/news.html.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: I want to gather news and information from diverse international sources. First, collect Arabic news from multiple outlets including Aljazeera, CNN Arabic, and Youm7. Then, retrieve current COVID-19 statistics for both Egypt and the United States for comparison. Also, search for English-language news articles about Middle East politics from international sources. Additionally, find news articles in Swahili to understand East African coverage. I'm also interested in the top developer community articles from dev.to this month. Finally, retrieve information about past events from the 2020 U.S. election, focusing on page 1 of the results.
simple_rewrite: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather information from diverse international sources. Could you help me collect news from Arabic outlets like Aljazeera, CNN Arabic, and Youm7 using the Arabic news API? I'd also like to compare the current COVID-19 statistics between Egypt and the United States from Coronavirus Smartable. While you're at it, please look up some English-language articles about Middle East politics from international sources (News Network), and find some news coverage in Swahili so I can understand the East African perspective via the Kenyan News Api. I'm curious about what's trending in tech too, so could you pull the top developer community articles from dev.to this month? Lastly, I need some historical context - can you retrieve information about the 2020 U.S. election from Election2020 Smartable, just focusing on the first page of results?
hard_rewrite: I've been thinking about expanding my global perspective lately. I wonder what stories are being told in the Arabic-speaking world right now - perhaps from those major news outlets based in Qatar, Egypt, and other regional hubs? And with all the changes since the pandemic, I'm curious how the health situation compares between North Africa and North America these days. I'd also like to understand more about regional politics through international perspectives in English. Speaking of diverse viewpoints, I've always been fascinated by East African media - what stories are being shared in languages like Swahili? On a different note, what technical discussions are resonating most with software developers this month? And lastly, I've been reflecting on recent history - what were those pivotal moments from that contentious election cycle a few years back? The first page should give me enough context.

query: I'm trying to stay up-to-date on financial news and global media. Could you help me find the latest cryptocurrency news from various sources including social media, blogs, and official announcements? While you're at it, please check if India Today has published any crypto-related articles recently. I'm also interested in expanding my news sources - could you tell me about Greek news outlets that publish in English and what regions around the world have AI news coverage? I'd like to see some Arabic news content from both RT and CNN as well. Finally, I need to catch up on business developments, so please pull the latest headlines from BizToc's main page, and I'm curious about the 2020 US election - could you find information about both past and upcoming events related to it?

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves news articles based on a specified tag. This endpoint is part of the India Today Unofficial API, a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It leverages the API's database of articles, videos, and images to deliver curated news tailored to the selected tag, enabling developers to integrate topic-specific news into their applications. Unlike official channels, this tool offers flexible access to India Today's content through a developer-friendly interface, though it is not affiliated with or endorsed by India Today itself.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: Search for the latest cryptocurrency news across multiple sources including social media, blogs, and official announcements. Also check if there are any cryptocurrency-related articles from India Today. Additionally, I'd like to explore news resources by getting information about Greek news sources in English, available AI news regions globally, and accessing Arabic news from RT and CNN. Finally, retrieve the latest business news from BizToc's main page and check for information about the 2020 US election events, both past and upcoming.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay up-to-date on financial news and global media. Could you help me find the latest cryptocurrency news from various sources including social media, blogs, and official announcements? While you're at it, please check if India Today has published any crypto-related articles recently. I'm also interested in expanding my news sources - could you tell me about Greek news outlets that publish in English and what regions around the world have AI news coverage? I'd like to see some Arabic news content from both RT and CNN as well. Finally, I need to catch up on business developments, so please pull the latest headlines from BizToc's main page, and I'm curious about the 2020 US election - could you find information about both past and upcoming events related to it?
hard_rewrite: I've been tracking digital currency developments lately and could use a comprehensive update. What's buzzing across different platforms right now - from social conversations to official announcements? I'm particularly curious if any Indian publications like India Today have covered recent developments. Also, I'm trying to diversify my news sources - are there any English-language outlets from Greece I should be following? What regions globally offer AI-curated news coverage? I'd also be interested in seeing how Arabic news outlets like RT and CNN are covering current events. For general business updates, what's trending on BizToc's front page? And while we're discussing significant events, I'm researching how the 2020 US election unfolded - both what happened and what was scheduled to happen.

query: I'm trying to stay informed about both COVID-19 and current events across different regions. Could you pull up the latest COVID-19 statistics for the United States, globally, and specifically for India? Also, I'd like to catch up on news - particularly business updates from US sources, general headlines from India Today, and top articles for developers on dev.to. While you're at it, could you also check for Arabic news coverage from RT and Sky News, and grab the business section stories from Moka News?

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events around the globe. Could you pull up today's top headlines from various categories? I'm particularly interested in LGBTQ+ stories, business developments, what's happening in the movie industry, and any anime-related news. I'd also appreciate seeing regional coverage from different parts of the world and information about which global regions have news available for browsing.
hard_rewrite: I've been feeling disconnected from current events lately. I wonder what's happening in the world right now? I'm particularly curious about communities that don't always get mainstream coverage, like LGBTQ+ stories. Also, what's the latest in the business world? I love films and anime too - any interesting developments there? And I'm planning some international travel soon - I'd like to understand what regions have good news coverage so I can stay informed about local events wherever I go.

query: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different regions and topics. Could you pull together a comprehensive news overview for me? I'd like to see the latest trending business headlines, what's happening in U.S. politics, and some top tech articles from dev.to. Also, I'm interested in browsing recent global headlines, checking what's going on in India, and looking at some Arabic news coverage. Finally, can you include some information about the 2020 U.S. election? I appreciate having multiple sources to get a well-rounded perspective.

This API endpoint fetches the most popular and trending content from dev.to, a community-driven website where developers share knowledge, experiences, and insights through blog posts. The service provides easy access to the most impactful developer-focused content without having to manually search through the site, helping users stay updated with current trends and valuable insights in the tech community.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves news articles based on a specified tag. This endpoint is part of the India Today Unofficial API, a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It leverages the API's database of articles, videos, and images to deliver curated news tailored to the selected tag, enabling developers to integrate topic-specific news into their applications. Unlike official channels, this tool offers flexible access to India Today's content through a developer-friendly interface, though it is not affiliated with or endorsed by India Today itself.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: Show me the latest news from multiple sources. I want to see trending business news, U.S. political news, top tech articles from dev.to, recent global headlines, news about India, Arabic news coverage, and information about the 2020 U.S. election. Please provide a comprehensive news overview using these different news sources and APIs.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different regions and topics. Could you pull together a comprehensive news overview for me? I'd like to see the latest trending business headlines, what's happening in U.S. politics, and some top tech articles from dev.to. Also, I'm interested in browsing recent global headlines, checking what's going on in India, and looking at some Arabic news coverage. Finally, can you include some information about the 2020 U.S. election? I appreciate having multiple sources to get a well-rounded perspective.
hard_rewrite: I've been feeling disconnected from what's happening in the world lately. I'd love to catch up on current affairs across different regions. What's trending in the business world right now? And I'm curious about the political climate in America. I also follow tech developments - what are developers discussing on their community platforms? I'm particularly interested in what's happening in my ancestral homeland of India, and I'd like to understand perspectives from Arabic-speaking regions too. Oh, and I was wondering if there are any retrospectives about that major electoral event from a few years back - you know, the one that dominated headlines in 2020.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves news articles based on a specified tag. This endpoint is part of the India Today Unofficial API, a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It leverages the API's database of articles, videos, and images to deliver curated news tailored to the selected tag, enabling developers to integrate topic-specific news into their applications. Unlike official channels, this tool offers flexible access to India Today's content through a developer-friendly interface, though it is not affiliated with or endorsed by India Today itself.

query: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather comprehensive information from various sources. Could you pull the 50 most recent news articles from around the world? I'd also like to see a complete list of available news sources across different services. Specifically, I'm interested in the latest stories from BBC, English language articles from Malaysia Kini, and the business categories and subcategories covered by Reuters. Additionally, can you show me what geographic regions AI News covers? I'm curious about upcoming U.S. election events as well. For my international analysis, I need to find news publishers filtered by country, language, and category - particularly business and technology news from the US, UK, India, Japan, UAE, and Saudi Arabia in English, Arabic, and Japanese. Lastly, please include the most recent Arabic news articles from Hibapress.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves the 50 most recent news articles from global sources. This endpoint leverages a comprehensive news scraping API that continuously collects fresh content every minute from over 30 diverse international news outlets (with plans to expand to hundreds of sources). The service ensures users have access to up-to-date information from around the world without needing to visit multiple news sites individually.

task_description: This task involves creating a deep-dive report on a specific topic by searching for initial articles, extracting the full content for analysis, and then finding related stories to build a complete, multi-source picture of an event or subject.
refined_query: I need to gather the latest news from multiple global sources. First, show me the 50 most recent news articles from around the world. Then, provide me with a list of all available news sources from different services. Additionally, get the latest BBC news stories, English language news articles from Malaysia Kini, and business news categories and subcategories from Reuters. I'm also interested in seeing what geographic regions are covered by AI News, upcoming U.S. election events, and available news publishers filtered by country, language, and category (specifically business and technology news from the US, UK, India, Japan, UAE, and Saudi Arabia in English, Arabic, and Japanese). Finally, include the latest Arabic news from Hibapress.
simple_rewrite: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather comprehensive information from various sources. Could you pull the 50 most recent news articles from around the world? I'd also like to see a complete list of available news sources across different services. Specifically, I'm interested in the latest stories from BBC, English language articles from Malaysia Kini, and the business categories and subcategories covered by Reuters. Additionally, can you show me what geographic regions AI News covers? I'm curious about upcoming U.S. election events as well. For my international analysis, I need to find news publishers filtered by country, language, and category - particularly business and technology news from the US, UK, India, Japan, UAE, and Saudi Arabia in English, Arabic, and Japanese. Lastly, please include the most recent Arabic news articles from Hibapress.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about what's happening around the world. I wonder what stories are making headlines right now across different outlets? It would be interesting to know what news sources are actually available through these systems. I'm particularly curious about what the BBC is reporting today, and what English-language stories are coming out of Malaysia. For my financial research, I'd like to understand how business news is organized - what categories and subcategories exist in the Reuters ecosystem? refined_query: Please retrieve the top 20 technology news headlines from US sources in English, followed by the top 20 business news headlines also from US sources in English. Then get the latest police and crime news from Germany. Additionally, fetch the latest Arabic news from RT Arabic. Finally, show me the first page of information about politicians and influencers from the 2020 US election, including their political affiliations and influence metrics.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing some media research for a project on global news coverage and political analysis. Could you pull up the top 20 technology headlines from US sources in English? I'd also like to see the latest US business news headlines in English, again limiting it to about 20 articles. While we're at it, I'm curious about international coverage too - can you find the latest police and crime news from Germany? Also, I'd like to check out some Arabic news from Russia Today. Finally, I need information on politicians and influencers from the 2020 US election - specifically the first page of results showing their political affiliations, key issues they focused on, and their influence metrics.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about what's happening in the world lately. I wonder what the tech scene in America looks like right now - are there any significant developments? And I'm curious about how the business landscape is evolving in the US too. On another note, I've heard there have been some interesting police incidents in Germany recently - what's going on there? I also need to brush up on my Arabic news consumption and was thinking about checking what RT is reporting these days. Oh, and with all the political changes since 2020, I'm interested in seeing who the key figures were during that election cycle and understanding their positions and influence. What can you tell me about all this?

query: I'm trying to stay informed about what's happening around the world. Could you help me gather the latest news from several sources? I'd like to see recent US technology headlines, check out some general global news updates, browse through BBC's Arabic news coverage, and catch up on the newest anime developments. I'm hoping to get a comprehensive overview of current events across these different categories and languages.

query: I'm trying to stay updated on the pandemic situation in Malaysia. Could you help me find the latest news about COVID-19 there? I'd like to see the current infection statistics from Coronavirus Smartable as well as any related financial news that shows how the pandemic is affecting their economy.

tool_list.tool name: Malaysia Kini: Get Article by SID
tool_list.tool description: Returns the full content of a specific news article based on the article's sid (story ID) that was previously obtained from the Get Latest Article List method. This endpoint is part of the Live News service by Malaysia Kini, providing access to current Malaysian news articles and their complete content for users seeking up-to-date information from this Malaysian news source.

Locals continue to comprise the majority of new cases (59.5 percent), with most infections detected in the Klang Valley followed by Johor and Sarawak.

Patients in ICUs: 195

Intubated: 95

Active cases are still on a downtrend as recoveries continue to outpace new cases. There are no discernable trends in terms of those needing intensive care.

Almost 80 percent of new cases in Selangor were detected through existing clusters or contact tracing amidst the normalisation of contact tracing efforts.

Deaths

Two deaths were reported in Kuala Lumpur. There was one each reported in Selangor, Sarawak, Sabah, Johor and Kelantan.

The national Covid-19 death toll stood at 1,148. The Klang Valley region accounted for 34.6 percent of the figure.

The victims age range from 55 to 81 - all with comorbidity. Details of the victims are on the Kini News Lab tracker website.

Clusters

Of the 11 new clusters classified today, six were detected through targeted screening. Other types of detections would suggest community spread.

One notable cluster was Kampung Gedang, which involved a funeral in Malacca and 35 cases.

refined_query: I want to research news articles from various sources. First, I'd like to check the latest Philippine news stories. Then, I'm interested in reading about cryptocurrency news and Bitcoin developments from different websites. Finally, I want to search for articles specifically about electoral reform published since November 2023, focusing on English-language content from the US, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, and Ireland, with results sorted by relevance and limited to 15 articles.
simple_rewrite: I'm working on a media analysis project and need to gather some diverse news content. Could you help me check out the latest Philippine news stories? Additionally, I need to find some recent research on electoral reform - specifically articles published since November 2023. For this last part, I'd like to focus only on English-language content from the US, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, and Ireland, with the most relevant articles listed first and limited to just 15 results.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about current events from multiple angles. Lastly, I've been following governance improvements in English-speaking democracies since just after last Halloween - especially those Anglo countries like where the White House is located, where Parliament meets in Westminster, and their Commonwealth cousins. Maybe about 15 significant stories would give me a good overview of how they're improving their voting systems?

query: I'm trying to stay informed across different areas of interest. Could you help me gather a comprehensive view of the news landscape by first pulling a complete list of news categories from Moka News? Their service aggregates from over 30 global sources. After that, I'd like to check out what's happening in the tech world by browsing the most recent developer articles on dev.to - I'm particularly interested in programming tutorials and tech discussions. Lastly, I'm researching for a project and need to look up movie news specifically about 'political documentary election' using Kubric's movie news API - about 15 results would be perfect. This should give me a good mix of general news topics, fresh developer content, and some targeted information on political documentaries.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves the complete list of Moka News categories, which is essential for subsequent queries targeting specific news categories. This endpoint leverages a comprehensive news scraping API that aggregates the latest news content from over 30 global sources (with plans to expand to hundreds of sources), refreshing every minute to ensure up-to-date information. Understanding the available categories allows for more precise filtering when accessing the continuously updated news database.

I'm hoping to get a complete overview of both these areas.

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events from different perspectives. Could you pull up the latest news from multiple sources for me? I'm particularly interested in seeing coverage of the 2020 US election events, some current business headlines, various financial news categories, and I'd also like to check out some Arabic news from Youm7.
hard_rewrite: I'm trying to stay informed about what's happening in the world. Could you help me understand what took place during that pivotal U.S. election from a few years ago - the one in 2020? Also, I'm curious about today's business landscape - what headlines are making waves right now? I'd also appreciate knowing what different categories of financial news are available for tracking market trends. And lastly, I've been trying to improve my Arabic - what's being reported in مصر (Egypt) on اليوم السابع (Youm7) these days?

العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

tool_list.tool name: Kenyan News Api: Get the news in swahili
tool_list.tool description: Returns news articles in Swahili language, providing access to current events and information specifically in this East African language. This service aggregates news content from various sources and delivers it in Swahili, allowing users to stay informed about local and global developments through content that's linguistically and culturally relevant to Swahili speakers. The tool bridges information gaps by making news accessible in one of Africa's most widely spoken languages.

After that, show me the available categories from Reuters Business and Financial News. Also, find news articles in Swahili language. Finally, get the 50 most recent sports news articles.

I'd like to see the latest global climate change developments, as well as COVID-19 updates specifically for the US. While you're at it, can you show me what categories are available from Reuters Business and Financial News? I'm also interested in reading some news articles in Swahili language. Lastly, could you pull up the 50 most recent sports news articles?

I'm also trying to navigate financial information - what organizational structure does Reuters use for their business content? For my cultural studies section, I need to find content in East African languages, particularly the most widely spoken one in Kenya and Tanzania. Lastly, for the entertainment portion of my project, I need a comprehensive overview of athletic competitions and events from the last few days.

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
refined_query: Retrieve information from multiple news sources including: 2020 US election politicians and their affiliations (page 1), the latest Arabic news from Alarabiya, cryptocurrency blog posts, financial news subcategories from Reuters, and recent coronavirus news specifically for the United States.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing some research for a comprehensive news report. Could you help me gather information from multiple sources? I need details about politicians from the 2020 US election and their party affiliations from the first page of results. Also, I'd like to check out the latest Arabic news from Alarabiya, browse some recent cryptocurrency blog posts, and pull up financial news subcategories from Reuters. Finally, can you find the most recent coronavirus updates specifically for the United States?
hard_rewrite: I'm researching the political landscape and current events for a project. Could you help me understand who the key figures were in the last presidential race and their party affiliations? Also, I'm trying to keep up with what's happening in the Arab world - what's being reported on العربية right now? For my financial research, I'm curious about what topics are currently being discussed in cryptocurrency blogs and what categories Reuters organizes their financial news into. Lastly, with everything going on health-wise, what's the latest COVID situation specifically in America?

query: I'm trying to get a broad overview of news from different perspectives. Could you help me explore a variety of news sources across different categories and regions? I'd like to check out some top US news publishers, browse through the available page categories on BizToc for business news, and take a look at BizToc's news source blocks. I'm also interested in seeing some international coverage, particularly from CNN Arabic, and finally, I'd love to catch up on the latest anime news listings.

query: I'm working on a comprehensive media analysis project and need to gather information from various sources. Could you help me analyze current news trends by looking at 2020 US election politicians and influencers from the first page of results? I'd also like you to check trending business and finance topics on BizToc's main page, pull the latest 50 news articles from CNN, and gather top weekly developer articles from dev.to. While you're on dev.to, please collect all other relevant articles as well. Finally, I'm interested in international perspectives, so could you include recent Arabic news from the Egyptian source Youm7 (اليوم السابع)?

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves all the latest articles published on the dev.to platform. This endpoint connects to the dev.to website API to fetch the most recent blog posts, giving you immediate access to fresh content from the developer community without having to manually browse the site. The service provides a streamlined way to stay updated with new programming tutorials, tech discussions, and industry insights shared by developers on dev.to.

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
refined_query: Find information about Republican figures from the 2020 U.S. election, and then gather recent news articles from various sources including BBC, CNN Arabic, France24 Arabic, Hibapress, and the dev.to platform. For the election data, use page 1 and focus specifically on the 'republican-voice' topic.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing some political research for a project. Could you help me find information about Republican figures from the 2020 U.S. election, specifically focusing on the 'republican-voice' topic from page 1? Also, I'd like to look up some recent news articles from a variety of sources including BBC, CNN Arabic, France24 Arabic, Hibapress, and the dev.to platform to round out my research.
hard_rewrite: I'm researching political figures from the last presidential race before Biden took office. Could you help me understand who were the key voices from the conservative side during that time? Also, I'm trying to stay informed about current events from diverse perspectives - what are the latest headlines from major international news sources? I'm particularly interested in seeing what BBC is reporting alongside Arabic-language outlets like CNN Arabic, France24, and Hibapress. And while we're at it, what are developers discussing on dev.to these days? The contrast between political history and today's global news landscape fascinates me.

query: I'm doing some political and news research today. Could you help me identify which federal politicians from Ontario are currently active? I'd also like to check out the latest Arabic coverage from Aljazeera, and while you're at it, could you pull the 50 most recent world news articles for a broader perspective?

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves a list of politicians' data, including details like name, position, and affiliation. This endpoint is part of the Goverlytics API, which provides comprehensive political data and insights. It leverages a database of political figures and official records to deliver accurate, up-to-date information, enabling users to analyze political landscapes, track affiliations, and access detailed profiles efficiently.

العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves the 50 most recent news articles filtered by a specific category such as Sports, World, or others. This endpoint leverages a comprehensive news scraping API that continuously collects and updates content every minute from over 30 global news sources (with plans to expand to hundreds of sources). The service ensures you have access to fresh, diverse news content from around the world, organized by topic for easy consumption and analysis.

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
refined_query: Find active federal politicians from Ontario, retrieve the latest Arabic news from Aljazeera, and get the 50 most recent world news articles.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing some political and news research today. Could you help me identify which federal politicians from Ontario are currently active? I'd also like to check out the latest Arabic coverage from Aljazeera, and while you're at it, could you pull the 50 most recent world news articles for a broader perspective?
hard_rewrite: I'm researching Canadian political representation while also keeping up with international news. I'm curious about who's currently serving at the national level from Canada's most populous province. Also, I'd love to catch up on what's happening in the Middle East through native language sources - particularly from that major news network based in Qatar. And to round out my global perspective, what are the most significant world events being reported right now across various international outlets?

query: I'm doing some cross-cultural news research for an international politics project. Could you help me access that specific Malaysian news article (ID 565154) from Malaysia Kini? I'd also like to explore Arabic news coverage from multiple perspectives - specifically Aljazeera, France24 Arabic, and RT Arabic. As part of my research on U.S. politics, I need to look up information about Republican-affiliated individuals from the 2020 election (page 1, under the 'republican-voice' topic). I'm also tracking financial trends, so I'd appreciate access to those cryptocurrency blog posts through the specialized news feed. Finally, could you pull the 50 most recent political news articles from various global sources to round out my research?

tool_list.tool name: Malaysia Kini: Get Article by SID
tool_list.tool description: Returns the full content of a specific news article based on the article's sid (story ID) that was previously obtained from the Get Latest Article List method. This endpoint is part of the Live News service by Malaysia Kini, providing access to current Malaysian news articles and their complete content for users seeking up-to-date information from this Malaysian news source.

{'id': '565154', 'title': 'Covid-19 (March 3): 1,745 new cases, 7 deaths', 'text': 'COVID-19 | The Health Ministry today reported 1,745 new Covid-19 cases amidst seven more deaths.

Locals continue to comprise the majority of new cases (59.5 percent), with most infections detected in the Klang Valley followed by Johor and Sarawak.

Active cases: 24,025

Patients in ICUs: 195

Intubated: 95

Active cases are still on a downtrend as recoveries continue to outpace new cases. There are no discernable trends in terms of those needing intensive care.

Almost 80 percent of new cases in Selangor were detected through existing clusters or contact tracing amidst the normalisation of contact tracing efforts.

Deaths

Two deaths were reported in Kuala Lumpur. There was one each reported in Selangor, Sarawak, Sabah, Johor and Kelantan.

The national Covid-19 death toll stood at 1,148. The Klang Valley region accounted for 34.6 percent of the figure.

The victims age range from 55 to 81 - all with comorbidity. Details of the victims are on the Kini News Lab tracker website.

Clusters

Of the 11 new clusters classified today, six were detected through targeted screening. Other types of detections would suggest community spread.

One notable cluster was Kampung Gedang, which involved a funeral in Malacca and 35 cases.

Another community spread cluster was called Anak Gasing, which involved an elderly care centre and was detected when a person was screened prior to a hospital procedure.

This endpoint leverages the IEEE Spectrum News API, a simple HTTP-based REST-like service that enables developers and students to access and integrate current technology news and articles from IEEE Spectrum into their websites, web applications, or mobile apps. The API operates via HTTP GET requests with header-encoded parameters and delivers responses in JSON format, making it easy to incorporate the latest technology news into your projects.

العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay informed about global events from multiple perspectives. Could you provide a comprehensive overview of news sources that includes information about the upcoming U.S. elections with details on politicians and their affiliations, as well as any relevant events? I'd also like to see recent articles from CNN, browse some Swahili news coverage from Kenya, and check out Arabic reporting from Aljazeera. Additionally, can you pull up the latest business updates from BizToc, show me some recent cryptocurrency blog posts, and let me know which regions are available for global AI news coverage?
hard_rewrite: I'm researching media diversity for a global studies project. Could you help me understand how political figures are represented across different information sources? I'm particularly interested in seeing who's who in American politics right now and any upcoming political events. Also, what's currently making headlines on major networks like CNN? For my international component, I need examples of news in native languages - perhaps something from East Africa in Swahili and Middle Eastern perspectives in Arabic. My economics professor also wants us to include current business trends and emerging financial technologies like cryptocurrency. Finally, I need to know which global regions I could potentially analyze for AI-generated news content.

query: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather information from diverse international sources. Could you help me compile recent news articles from Malaysia Kini in English, along with some crime and police reporting from German sources? I'd also like to include Arabic coverage from Hibapress, popular programming content from dev.to, and BBC reporting via BizToc. Additionally, I need the latest COVID-19 updates for the United States from Coronavirus Smartable, the available page categories on BizToc, and about 50 of the most recent CNN stories through Moka News.

tool_list.tool name: dev-to-api: Get all the year's top articles
tool_list.tool description: Returns the top articles from the dev.to website for a specified year. This endpoint is part of an API that fetches blog content from dev.to, allowing users to access popular programming articles, tutorials, and discussions that received the highest engagement during a particular year. The service helps developers stay informed about trending topics and valuable resources in the software development community without having to manually search through the site's archives.
tool_list.API name: Get all the year's top articles

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
simple_rewrite: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather information from diverse international sources. Could you help me compile recent news articles from Malaysia Kini in English, along with some crime and police reporting from German sources? I'd also like to include Arabic coverage from Hibapress, popular programming content from dev.to, and BBC reporting via BizToc. Additionally, I need the latest COVID-19 updates for the United States from Coronavirus Smartable, the available page categories on BizToc, and about 50 of the most recent CNN stories through Moka News.
hard_rewrite: I'm planning a comprehensive media analysis project and need to gather diverse international perspectives. I'm curious about what's happening in Southeast Asia's English press, particularly from independent sources. Also, what are the latest public safety incidents being reported in German media? For my Arabic-speaking colleagues, what current events are trending in Morocco's press? I'm also interested in what the developer community is discussing most this year. Could you check what the BBC is covering right now? With the ongoing health situation, what's the latest COVID status in America? I'd like to understand the different news categories available on business news aggregators. Finally, I need a substantial sample of mainstream American news reporting - perhaps around 50 recent stories from a major network would give me enough data to analyze.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves a list of key topics related to the 2020 U.S. presidential election. This endpoint taps into the Election API's comprehensive database of election news, events, important figures, and frequently asked questions, providing access to information that has been carefully tagged with both democratic and republican perspectives. Users can explore these topics to gain balanced insights into the election landscape, with the freedom to consider viewpoints from across the political spectrum.

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
refined_query: Show me the latest news from multiple international sources. I'm interested in seeing news from Arabic sources like Youm7 and BBC Arabic, as well as specialized news about climate change, cryptocurrency, the 2020 US election, Swahili news from Kenya, business news from BizToc, general news from Egypt, and crypto discussions on Twitter.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay informed about global events from diverse perspectives. Could you pull up the latest news from international sources? I'd particularly like to see coverage from Arabic outlets like Youm7 and BBC Arabic. I'm also interested in reading specialized reporting on climate change, cryptocurrency developments, and follow-ups on the 2020 US election. Additionally, could you find some Swahili news from Kenya, check what's trending in business from BizToc, browse general news from Egypt, and see what people are saying about crypto on Twitter?
hard_rewrite: I've been feeling disconnected from global perspectives lately. I wonder what's happening in the Middle East right now - especially through local voices like those Egyptian news sources. And with all the extreme weather lately, I should probably catch up on environmental developments too. The political landscape has changed so much since 2020 - what were those pivotal moments again? I'm also curious what's happening with digital currencies these days - the online discussions seem particularly active. Oh, and I have family in Kenya who communicate primarily in Swahili - what news would they be reading? And for my investment portfolio, I should check what's happening in the Egyptian business world and see what crypto enthusiasts are talking about on social media.

query: I'm doing a comparative analysis of North American politics. Could you help me understand how political news coverage differs between the United States and Canada? I'd also like to learn about the current federal politicians in both countries and which news sources would be most relevant for following these political landscapes.

العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
refined_query: Compare political news coverage between the United States and Canada by: 1) retrieving information about current active federal politicians in both countries, 2) finding English-language business news sources from the US, 3) getting political news articles from both the US and Canada, 4) retrieving Arabic news from Aljazeera and Sky News Arabic, 5) checking this month's top developer articles from dev.to, and 6) listing all available geographic regions for news coverage.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing a comparative analysis of North American politics. Could you help me understand how political news coverage differs between the United States and Canada? I'd also like to learn about the current federal politicians in both countries and which news sources would be most relevant for following these political landscapes.
hard_rewrite: I've been noticing differences in how our northern neighbors and we cover government affairs. I'm curious about who's currently serving in Washington versus Ottawa at the federal level. Also, what kind of political stories are making headlines in both countries right now? It would be interesting to see how the media landscapes compare across these North American democracies.

query: I'm trying to catch up on global news coverage. Could you pull up the latest headlines from a variety of international sources like CNN, BBC Arabic, CNN Arabic, and Malaysia Kini (in English)? I'd also like to see what India Today is reporting and check the current US political headlines. While you're at it, can you find information about the 2020 US election events from page 1, and retrieve that specific Kompas article with ID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178'? Finally, I'm curious about what news categories Moka News offers - could you show me a complete list of those?

task_description: This task focuses on tracking the activities of political figures and key electoral events. It requires querying specialized databases that contain structured information about politicians, their affiliations, and their scheduled appearances.
refined_query: Retrieve the 50 most recent news articles from CNN using Moka News, then get the latest news from BBC Arabic and CNN Arabic. Next, show me the latest English-language articles from Malaysia Kini. Also retrieve recent news from India Today, and the top US political headlines in English. Include information about past US election events from page 1 of Election2020 Smartable. Show me the details of the Kompas article with ID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178' about Bandung's flood prevention. Finally, list all available news categories from Moka News.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on global news coverage. Could you pull up the latest headlines from a variety of international sources like CNN, BBC Arabic, CNN Arabic, and Malaysia Kini (in English)? I'd also like to see what India Today is reporting and check the current US political headlines. While you're at it, can you find information about the 2020 US election events from page 1, and retrieve that specific Kompas article with ID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178'? Finally, I'm curious about what news categories Moka News offers - could you show me a complete list of those?
hard_rewrite: I'm curious about what's happening in the world today. Could you help me explore some international perspectives? I'd like to see what CNN is reporting alongside some Arabic viewpoints from both BBC and CNN's Arabic services. I'm also interested in what's being discussed in Southeast Asian media - particularly the English content from Malaysia Kini - as well as major headlines from India Today. For American news, I'm especially interested in political developments. Also, I've been meaning to look back at some historical context around the 2020 election - particularly those early events. There was also this specific article about flood prevention in Bandung with retention ponds that I wanted to revisit - I believe the ID ended with '114935178'. Oh, and before I forget, what are all the different news categories that Moka organizes their content into?
