tool_list.tool description: Retrieves news articles based on a specified tag. This endpoint is part of the India Today Unofficial API, a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It leverages the API's database of articles, videos, and images to deliver curated news tailored to the selected tag, enabling developers to integrate topic-specific news into their applications. Unlike official channels, this tool offers flexible access to India Today's content through a developer-friendly interface, though it is not affiliated with or endorsed by India Today itself.

query: I'm trying to get a well-rounded perspective on current global events. Could you pull up the latest news from India Today, check what's trending in cryptocurrency discussions on Twitter, and also find some Arabic news coverage from Aljazeera? I'm interested in comparing how these different sources and regions are covering the same events to build a more comprehensive understanding of international perspectives.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves all the latest news articles from the India Today platform. This uses a third-party web service that provides access to current news content, including articles, videos, and images across various topics from India Today's media network. The API allows developers to stay updated with recent news developments without having to manually browse the website, though it should be noted this is an unofficial API not directly provided by India Today.

سيطرت -اليوم السبت- على المنشآت العسكرية في مقاطعة روستوف (جنوبي البلاد) وهدد بالتوجه للعاصمة موسكو، وذلك في تحرك يستهدف الإطاحة بالقيادة العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

tool_list.tool name: Malaysia Kini: Get Article by SID
tool_list.tool description: Returns the full content of a specific news article based on the article's sid (story ID) that was previously obtained from the Get Latest Article List method. This endpoint is part of the Live News service by Malaysia Kini, providing access to current Malaysian news articles and their complete content for users seeking up-to-date information from this Malaysian news source.

{'id': '565154', 'title': 'Covid-19 (March 3): 1,745 new cases, 7 deaths', 'text': 'COVID-19 | The Health Ministry today reported 1,745 new Covid-19 cases amidst seven more deaths.

Locals continue to comprise the majority of new cases (59.5 percent), with most infections detected in the Klang Valley followed by Johor and Sarawak.

Active cases: 24,025

Patients in ICUs: 195

Intubated: 95

Active cases are still on a downtrend as recoveries continue to outpace new cases. There are no discernable trends in terms of those needing intensive care.

Almost 80 percent of new cases in Selangor were detected through existing clusters or contact tracing amidst the normalisation of contact tracing efforts.

Deaths

Two deaths were reported in Kuala Lumpur. There was one each reported in Selangor, Sarawak, Sabah, Johor and Kelantan.

The national Covid-19 death toll stood at 1,148. The Klang Valley region accounted for 34.6 percent of the figure.

The victims age range from 55 to 81 - all with comorbidity. Details of the victims are on the Kini News Lab tracker website.

Clusters

Of the 11 new clusters classified today, six were detected through targeted screening. Other types of detections would suggest community spread.

One notable cluster was Kampung Gedang, which involved a funeral in Malacca and 35 cases.

Another community spread cluster was called Anak Gasing, which involved an elderly care centre and was detected when a person was screened prior to a hospital procedure.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: Show me a specific article from Malaysia Kini with story ID 565154, then list the available page categories on BizToc. After that, retrieve topics related to the 2020 US presidential election, followed by general news from Australia. Finally, get the latest news headlines from CNN Arabic.
simple_rewrite: I'm browsing through some news sources for a research project. Could you pull up that specific article from Malaysia Kini with story ID 565154? While I'm organizing my research, I'd also like to see what page categories are available on BizToc. I'm particularly interested in finding topics related to the 2020 US presidential election, and I'd appreciate if you could also gather some general news from Australia. Lastly, can you check the latest headlines from CNN Arabic to give me a more international perspective?
hard_rewrite: I'm researching a Malaysian news story with reference number 565154 - could you help me see what it's about? Also, I'm curious about the different sections available on that business news aggregator site, BizToc. I'm working on a political analysis and need information about what happened during the last presidential race before Biden took office. After that, I'd like to check what's happening in the general news from down under. And finally, I'm practicing my Arabic reading skills - what are the latest headlines from that major international news network's Arabic service?

query: I'm trying to broaden my news consumption with more international perspectives. Could you help me explore BizToc.com first by showing me what page categories they offer? I'd also like to check out the latest sports coverage, and while we're at it, pull up some historical articles from the 2020 U.S. election (just page 1). I'm particularly interested in Middle Eastern viewpoints, so could you find some news from CNN Arabic? Lastly, I'd love to see some news articles in Swahili to understand what's happening in East Africa.

This service aggregates news content from various sources and delivers it in Swahili, allowing users to stay informed about local and global developments through content that's linguistically and culturally relevant to Swahili speakers. The tool bridges information gaps by making news accessible in one of Africa's most widely spoken languages.

simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on various news topics this morning. Could you help me browse through different sources? I'd like to check out the latest general news stories on BizToc's main page, look up some recent cryptocurrency blog posts, and pull information on Republican-affiliated individuals from the 2020 US election (just page 1). hard_rewrite: I'm curious about what's happening in the world today. Could you help me get a pulse on current events? I'd like to see what business and finance stories are trending right now. I'm also interested in understanding who were some of the key conservative figures from the last presidential election. And what's making headlines in the Indian subcontinent these days? Oh, and I could use some uplifting entertainment news - perhaps some positive stories about films from that publication that covers all things Hollywood?

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: I need to gather news from multiple sources. First, get the latest news stories from BBC. Then, find 5 positive movie news articles from the Hollywood Reporter. After that, retrieve the most recent NFT news updates. I'd also like to see the latest Arabic news from Alarabiya. Additionally, show me upcoming election events from page 1. Finally, find top English-language news sources from the United States.
simple_rewrite: I'm working on a media research project and need to compile some diverse news content. Could you help me gather the latest stories from BBC, along with 5 positive movie-related articles from the Hollywood Reporter? I'm also interested in seeing the most recent updates on NFT news and the latest Arabic coverage from Alarabiya. As part of my research, I'd like to check out upcoming election events from the first page of results, and finally, identify the top English-language news outlets based in the United States.
hard_rewrite: I've been thinking about staying informed across different media landscapes. I wonder what's happening in the UK right now through their major public broadcaster? Also, I'm curious about any uplifting stories from the entertainment industry - particularly from that publication known for covering Hollywood. The digital art market has been evolving so quickly too - what's the latest there? And since I'm trying to improve my Arabic, could you help me find recent news in that language? I'm also researching civic engagement and wondering what important democratic events are coming up soon. Lastly, for a media literacy project, I'm trying to identify which English-language news outlets have the most reach in America.

query: I'm trying to catch up on news from around the world. Could you pull up the latest general news stories from BizToc's main page? I'd also like to check out what's happening with cryptocurrency from the ALL Crypto News Feed. While you're at it, can you gather the 100 most recent articles from Moka News? I'm also curious about what Greek news sources are available in English, and I'd love to know what different page categories BizToc offers. Lastly, could you include the latest Arabic news from Hibapress?

{'id': '565154', 'title': 'Covid-19 (March 3): 1,745 new cases, 7 deaths', 'text': 'COVID-19 | The Health Ministry today reported 1,745 new Covid-19 cases amidst seven more deaths.

Locals continue to comprise the majority of new cases (59.5 percent), with most infections detected in the Klang Valley followed by Johor and Sarawak.

Active cases: 24,025

Patients in ICUs: 195

Intubated: 95

Active cases are still on a downtrend as recoveries continue to outpace new cases. There are no discernable trends in terms of those needing intensive care.

Almost 80 percent of new cases in Selangor were detected through existing clusters or contact tracing amidst the normalisation of contact tracing efforts.

Deaths

Two deaths were reported in Kuala Lumpur. There was one each reported in Selangor, Sarawak, Sabah, Johor and Kelantan.

The national Covid-19 death toll stood at 1,148. The Klang Valley region accounted for 34.6 percent of the figure.

The victims age range from 55 to 81 - all with comorbidity. Details of the victims are on the Kini News Lab tracker website.

Clusters

Of the 11 new clusters classified today, six were detected through targeted screening. Other types of detections would suggest community spread.

One notable cluster was Kampung Gedang, which involved a funeral in Malacca and 35 cases.

Another community spread cluster was called Anak Gasing, which involved an elderly care centre and was detected when a person was screened prior to a hospital procedure.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay informed about global events across different regions and industries. Could you help me find the latest news headlines? I'm particularly interested in top US technology stories, recent cryptocurrency developments from various sources, and business updates related to Apple and Microsoft. I'd also like to catch up on information about the 2020 US election events, check out recent police and crime reporting from Germany, see what's happening in Cameroon right now, and browse the latest Arabic news from Hibapress.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about what's happening around the world lately. I wonder what technological developments are making headlines in America right now? Also, the cryptocurrency market seems volatile - what's the latest buzz across different sources? I'm curious how those big tech giants - you know, the ones with the fruit logo and the windows software - are performing in the business world. And speaking of America, what were some of the key events during that contentious election a few years back? On another note, I've heard there have been some concerning public safety incidents in Germany recently. I also have family in Central Africa and would appreciate knowing what's happening in Cameroon these days. Finally, my Arabic-speaking friend recommended Hibapress for news - what stories are they covering right now?

query: I'm conducting research on various news platforms and their regional coverage capabilities. Could you help me explore the Election2020 Smartable: GetTopics tool to see how it presents balanced perspectives from both democratic and republican viewpoints on the 2020 U.S. presidential election? I'm also interested in international coverage - specifically, could you access the German Police and Crime News Live for updates on public safety incidents in Germany? Additionally, I'd like to check economic reporting in Africa by searching Instant Cameroon News with the 'economy' parameter. I need to examine a specific Indonesian article from Kompas using their kompas-detail tool with guid '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178', and I'm curious about Arabic content available through CNN Arabic's API. While you're at it, could you show me what news categories Moka News offers across their 30+ global sources? Finally, I need to look up details on a particular politician using Goverlytics with their ID '437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190'.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: I'm analyzing various news tools and their capabilities across different regions and topics. First, I looked at election-related information by using the Election2020 Smartable: GetTopics tool to retrieve key topics from the 2020 U.S. presidential election with balanced perspectives from both democratic and republican viewpoints. Then I explored international news by accessing German Police and Crime News Live to get updates on police activities, crimes, and public safety incidents in Germany. I also searched for economic news from Cameroon using the Instant Cameroon News tool with the search parameter 'economy'. I accessed a specific Indonesian news article from Kompas using the Indonesia News: kompas-detail tool with the guid parameter '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178'. I retrieved Arabic news content from CNN Arabic using the Arabic news API. I also checked the available news categories from Moka News which aggregates content from over 30 global sources. Finally, I looked up information about a specific politician using the Goverlytics tool with the politician's unique ID '437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190'.
simple_rewrite: I'm conducting research on various news platforms and their regional coverage capabilities. Could you help me explore the Election2020 Smartable: GetTopics tool to see how it presents balanced perspectives from both democratic and republican viewpoints on the 2020 U.S. presidential election? I'm also interested in international coverage - specifically, could you access the German Police and Crime News Live for updates on public safety incidents in Germany? Additionally, I'd like to check economic reporting in Africa by searching Instant Cameroon News with the 'economy' parameter. I need to examine a specific Indonesian article from Kompas using their kompas-detail tool with guid '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178', and I'm curious about Arabic content available through CNN Arabic's API. While you're at it, could you show me what news categories Moka News offers across their 30+ global sources? Finally, I need to look up details on a particular politician using Goverlytics with their ID '437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190'.
hard_rewrite: I've been exploring different media landscapes for my comparative journalism project. I started by examining how the 2020 presidential race was covered from multiple perspectives - I was particularly interested in seeing how balanced the reporting was between the two major political viewpoints. Then I shifted to European coverage, specifically looking at public safety reporting in Germany to understand how they cover incidents and police activities. For my section on African media, I tried searching for economic developments in Cameroon but had trouble finding relevant content. I also wanted to include an example from Indonesian media, so I looked up a specific article from Kompas using that reference number I saved earlier - something about urban planning I believe. For Middle Eastern perspectives, I accessed some Arabic language content to see how CNN's Arabic service differs from their English coverage. I'm also trying to understand what content categories are typically available across global news aggregators that pull from multiple sources. Lastly, for my section on local governance reporting, I was researching that Vancouver city official whose profile I bookmarked with their unique identifier.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: Show me the latest cryptocurrency news from multiple sources including Twitter, blogs, and announcements. Also, get me recent U.S. news, information about the 2020 U.S. election events, detailed articles from Kompas (Indonesian news with ID .xml.2023.06.20.114935178), and the latest Arabic news from RT and France24.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay updated on global news and financial trends. Could you pull up the latest cryptocurrency news from various sources like Twitter, blogs, and official announcements? While you're at it, I'd also appreciate seeing recent U.S. news headlines and some information about the 2020 U.S. election events. I'm also interested in international perspectives, so could you find some detailed articles from Kompas (that Indonesian news source with ID .xml.2023.06.20.114935178), as well as the most recent Arabic news coverage from both RT and France24?
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay on top of market trends lately. What's happening in the digital currency space? I'm curious about what people are saying across different platforms - from social discussions to official announcements. Also, I'm interested in what's going on in America these days, especially regarding that major political event from a few years back. I've heard there's some interesting reporting from that Indonesian publication - the one with that specific article from mid-2023 about urban planning. And I should probably catch up on Middle Eastern perspectives too - particularly from those Russian and French outlets that publish in Arabic.

query: I'm trying to stay up-to-date on various news topics for my research. For a more global perspective, I'd appreciate seeing some Arabic news coverage from Aljazeera, and I'd like to check what's happening specifically in the US region through the AI News Global platform.

سيطرت -اليوم السبت- على المنشآت العسكرية في مقاطعة روستوف (جنوبي البلاد) وهدد بالتوجه للعاصمة موسكو، وذلك في تحرك يستهدف الإطاحة بالقيادة العسكرية.","date":"24/6/2023","image":"https://www.aljazeera.netundefined","url":"https://www.aljazeera.net/news/liveblog/2023/6/24/%d8%b9%d8%a7%d8%ac%d9%84-%d8%a2%d8%ae%d8%b1-%d8%aa%d8%b7%d9%88%d8%b1%d8%a7%d8%aa-%d8%a7%d9%84%d8%aa%d9%85%d8%b1%d8%af-%d8%a7%d9%84%d9%85%d8%b3%d9%84%d8%ad-%d9%84%d9%85%d8%ac%d9%85%d9%88%d8%b9%d8%a9"},{"headline":"الأحقيات واستحقاقات المستقبل السوري","underHeadline":"","content":"رمزية لافتة أن اختير معهد العالم العربي ليضم اجتماعات مبادرة \"مدنية\"، وهي خطوة لافتة في دفعها للأمام، ولا سيما في توقيتها بعد أن عاد الحُكم ممثلا للدولة السورية في جامعة الدول العربية، وكذلك في تمحورها حول عنوان لافت هو \"الأحقية السياسية للفضاء المدني السوري\".وهذا الحدث بما سبقه وتلاه فرصة للنظر فيما ينبغي للوصول إلى مستقبل سوري طال انتظاره من ملايين القابعين على قارعة الحياة التي يرونها من زاوية عمر يتسرب، وعيشٍ قاسٍ مترعٍ بالقلق والتوتر، يكاد يشمل كل السوريين في مناطق سلطات الأمر الواقع، وفي مخيمات اللجوء، وحتى المقيمين في الخارج، والحاصلين على جنسيات مختلفة، بغية استشراف ثنائية الأحقية والاستحقاق، وأيهما المؤثر؟ وأيهما ينبغي أن يتأثر؟ وكيف؟ وإلى أي حد؟ بعيدا عن جدلية العربة والحصان.وما يتحدث عنه كل أطراف المشهد السوري وكل النافذين فيه عن أهمية ولزوم حل سياسي سوري-سوري أو ما يوصف بعبارة \"بقيادة سورية\"، هو في واقع الحال ليس أكثر من كلام لملء الفراغ وتمرير الوقت وللاتكاء عليه حين تحين ساعة الفعل وترجمة الأقوال إلى أفعال على الأرض العطشى لإنصاف واستقرار وسلام ملَّ السوريين من مجرد التأكيد عليه والقلق بشأنه وهم يعانون من وطأة المناورات على الوقت.ولا شك أن استحقاقات الخلاص السوري تبحث عن حواملها الوطنية التي تصطف وتتكاتف لأجل وطن جريح وشعب كسير، وهي استحقاقات لا تبحث عن السياسة بقدر ما تهتم بالضغط نحو ما يتوجب فعله لإحقاق الحقوق وجبر الأضرار وفتح الباب أمام مستقبلٍ ليس في طياته ما يعيد تكرار الفاجعة،

simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay up-to-date on various news topics for my research. Could you help me explore BizToc's available page categories and news sources to get a better understanding of their business and finance news ecosystem? I'd also like to look up the latest technology developments from IEEE Spectrum. While you're at it, can you pull current NFT news and trending topics in that space? I'm interested in what developers are discussing too - could you show me both recent and top-rated articles from this year on dev.to? For a more global perspective, I'd appreciate seeing some Arabic news coverage from Aljazeera, and I'd like to check what's happening specifically in the US region through the AI News Global platform.
hard_rewrite: I've been thinking about staying current with what's happening in different sectors. I wonder how BizToc organizes their content - what categories do they cover? And who are their main information providers in the business world? I'm also curious about what cutting-edge technology developments IEEE Spectrum is featuring this week. The digital collectibles space seems to be constantly evolving - what's the latest buzz there? And I'd love to see what the developer community is discussing on dev.to, both what's trending right now and what's been most impactful this year. For a more global perspective, I'd appreciate seeing some Arabic coverage from Aljazeera, and I'm particularly interested in what's making headlines in the American news landscape.

query: I'm doing some cross-cultural research for a project on global news and politics. Could you help me gather information from various sources? I'd like to start by checking general news from both the US and UAE regions through the News Network API. After that, I'm interested in looking up information about active federal-level politicians using the Goverlytics API, but let's limit that to just 10 results. To round out my research, I'd appreciate if you could access several specialized news services: German police and crime news, anime updates, movie industry sources from Kubric, and Arabic news from France24. Finally, I'd like to examine topics related to the 2020 US presidential election through the Election2020 Smartable API.

tool_list.tool description: Returns a curated list of news articles filtered by your selected region and category preferences. This endpoint leverages a global network of news sources to provide comprehensive coverage across different geographical areas and topic categories, giving you access to relevant news content from around the world. You can explore the functionality through their demo site at https://core-api.net/news/news.html.

tool_list.tool name: Anime News Net: Get anime news list
tool_list.tool description: Retrieves the most up-to-date anime list in real time, providing current information on available anime titles. This anime news API gives users access to comprehensive anime information as part of a service that delivers the latest anime news, including headlines, categories, publication dates, and brief introductions. The API also includes relevant images and full content for news items, enabling users to stay effortlessly informed about both current anime titles and breaking news in the anime world.

tool_list.tool name: Kubric: The Comprehensive Movie News API: Sources
tool_list.tool description: Returns the sources used for articles based on your current subscription tier. This endpoint leverages Kubric's comprehensive movie news API, which aggregates content from top industry sources to deliver cinema updates and insights. Your tier level determines which source attributions are accessible, allowing you to track information origins while staying up-to-date with the latest film industry news, reviews, and developments through this visually engaging platform.

Users can explore these topics to gain balanced insights into the election landscape, with the freedom to consider viewpoints from across the political spectrum.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: Please retrieve current general news from both the US and UAE regions using the News Network API. Then find information about 10 active politicians at the federal government level using the Goverlytics API. After that, show me the latest German police and crime news, followed by current anime news headlines. Also check for recent movie industry news from Kubric, Arabic news from France24, and finally retrieve the main topics related to the 2020 US presidential election, including both Republican and Democratic perspectives.
simple_rewrite: I'm doing some cross-cultural research for a project on global news and politics. Could you help me gather information from various sources? I'd like to start by checking general news from both the US and UAE regions through the News Network API. After that, I'm interested in looking up information about active federal-level politicians using the Goverlytics API, but let's limit that to just 10 results. To round out my research, I'd appreciate if you could access several specialized news services: German police and crime news, anime updates, movie industry sources from Kubric, and Arabic news from France24. Finally, I'd like to examine topics related to the 2020 US presidential election through the Election2020 Smartable API.
hard_rewrite: I've been diving into media coverage patterns lately. I wonder how news reporting varies across different regions and topics. It would be interesting to see what's making headlines in America compared to the Middle East. And beyond mainstream coverage, I'm curious about specialized news sources - from government and political reporting to niche areas like German crime reporting, anime updates, and film industry developments. I'm particularly interested in how Arabic news outlets like France24 cover events differently. With the political landscape being so complex, I'd also like to understand what key themes emerged during the last major U.S. presidential election cycle.

query: I'm trying to stay informed about global events and would like to explore the news landscape. Could you give me an overview of the latest news stories available across different domains? I'm curious about what current content I can access through various news APIs - specifically looking for cryptocurrency updates, general world news, coverage from the Middle East and Philippines, Arabic news sources, and any information about the 2020 U.S. election. I'd appreciate a summary of what's available from these different sources and regions.

The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay informed about global events and would like to explore the news landscape. Could you give me an overview of the latest news stories available across different domains? I'm curious about what current content I can access through various news APIs - specifically looking for cryptocurrency updates, general world news, coverage from the Middle East and Philippines, Arabic news sources, and any information about the 2020 U.S. election. I'd appreciate a summary of what's available from these different sources and regions.
hard_rewrite: I've been wondering about the information landscape lately. What's happening in the digital world right now? I'm particularly curious about those blockchain-related updates that seem to be everywhere. Also, I'm trying to understand global perspectives - what stories are making headlines in places like the Middle East or the Philippines? And what about those Arabic news sources I've heard about? I'm also still trying to make sense of that major political event from a few years back - you know, the one that happened in 2020 in the US. It would be fascinating to see what kind of information is available across these different spheres.

query: I'm trying to catch up on current events from around the world. Could you help me gather the latest news from BBC and see what topics are trending on BizToc's main page? I'm particularly interested in the most recent COVID-19 updates for the United States, as well as some Arabic coverage from Youm7. While you're at it, I'd love to check out some business reporting from India Today. For future reference, could you let me know what page IDs are available on BizToc? Also, please pull the latest general headlines from BizToc's main page, look up that specific Kompas article with ID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178', and search for any articles about renewable energy on BizToc.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves news articles based on a specified tag. This endpoint is part of the India Today Unofficial API, a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It leverages the API's database of articles, videos, and images to deliver curated news tailored to the selected tag, enabling developers to integrate topic-specific news into their applications. Unlike official channels, this tool offers flexible access to India Today's content through a developer-friendly interface, though it is not affiliated with or endorsed by India Today itself.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: I need to find the latest news and trending topics across multiple news sources. First, retrieve the latest news from BBC, then check what topics are trending on BizToc's main page. Also, get me the latest COVID-19 news for the United States, and some Arabic news from Youm7. I'm also interested in business news from India Today, and would like to know what page IDs are available on BizToc for future reference. Please fetch the latest general news from BizToc's main page, a specific Kompas article with ID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178', and search for articles about renewable energy on BizToc.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events from around the world. Could you help me gather the latest news from BBC and see what topics are trending on BizToc's main page? I'm particularly interested in the most recent COVID-19 updates for the United States, as well as some Arabic coverage from Youm7. While you're at it, I'd love to check out some business reporting from India Today. For future reference, could you let me know what page IDs are available on BizToc? Also, please pull the latest general headlines from BizToc's main page, look up that specific Kompas article with ID '.xml.2023.06.20.114935178', and search for any articles about renewable energy on BizToc.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about what's happening in the world. I wonder what stories the British Broadcasting Corporation has been covering lately? And what topics seem to be capturing people's attention on that business and finance news aggregator site with the main page? I'm also concerned about the pandemic situation in America - are there any recent updates? I'd love to see what's being reported in Arabic media too, particularly from that Egyptian newspaper with the number in its name. For my investment research, I need some business headlines from that major Indian news outlet. By the way, what are all the different sections available on that finance aggregator site? I should check their main page for general news updates. There was a specific Indonesian article about water management in Bandung I wanted to read - I believe the ID ended with '114935178'. And finally, with climate change being such an important issue, I'm curious what articles about alternative power sources have been published recently.

query: I'm trying to catch up on current events across several areas I follow. Could you help me find the latest news in different categories? I'd like to see what's happening with current US federal politicians, and also check out the newest technology articles from IEEE Spectrum. I'm particularly interested in recent coronavirus updates from India, as well as the latest IPL cricket matches. While you're at it, could you pull any superhero movie news related to Marvel and DC? I'd also appreciate seeing the top US headlines in English, along with recent reports about narco activity in Mexico. Finally, I'm curious about key topics from the 2020 US election and would love to browse the most recent sports news articles.

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves a list of politicians' data, including details like name, position, and affiliation. This endpoint is part of the Goverlytics API, which provides comprehensive political data and insights. It leverages a database of political figures and official records to deliver accurate, up-to-date information, enabling users to analyze political landscapes, track affiliations, and access detailed profiles efficiently.

tool_list.tool name: IEEE Spectrum API: Get the latest 30 News from IEEE Spectrum
tool_list.tool description: Returns the latest 30 news articles from IEEE Spectrum as JSON objects containing title, URL, publication date, section, image source, and estimated reading time. This endpoint leverages the IEEE Spectrum News API, a simple HTTP-based REST-like service that enables developers and students to access and integrate current technology news and articles from IEEE Spectrum into their websites, web applications, or mobile apps. The API operates via HTTP GET requests with header-encoded parameters and delivers responses in JSON format, making it easy to incorporate the latest technology news into your projects.
tool_list.API name: Get the latest 30 News from IEEE Spectrum

tool_list.tool name: Latest IPL News: Get All IPL News

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: Find me the latest news across different categories. First, show me information about current US federal politicians. Then, get the latest technology news from IEEE Spectrum. Also, I'd like to see recent coronavirus updates from India, the latest IPL cricket news, and some superhero movie news related to Marvel and DC. Additionally, include top US headlines in English, recent news about narco activity in Mexico, key topics from the 2020 US election, and the most recent sports news articles.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events across several areas I follow. Could you help me find the latest news in different categories? I'd like to see what's happening with current US federal politicians, and also check out the newest technology articles from IEEE Spectrum. I'm particularly interested in recent coronavirus updates from India, as well as the latest IPL cricket matches. While you're at it, could you pull any superhero movie news related to Marvel and DC? I'd also appreciate seeing the top US headlines in English, along with recent reports about narco activity in Mexico. Finally, I'm curious about key topics from the 2020 US election and would love to browse the most recent sports news articles.
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about current events across different areas of interest. I wonder what's happening with our federal representatives in Washington these days? Also, I'm curious about the latest technological innovations - those IEEE Spectrum articles are always fascinating. With all that's going on globally, I'm particularly concerned about how India is managing the pandemic situation. And speaking of India, any updates on their cricket league matches? My nephew is obsessed with those superhero universes - both the Marvel and DC franchises - any buzz about upcoming films? I should probably catch up on general news headlines from around the US too. There were some concerning reports about cartel activity in Mexico recently - has there been any development there? It's hard to believe how much has changed since the 2020 election - what were the main issues people were focused on back then? Oh, and I almost forgot to ask about recent sports developments - my weekend conversations always seem to revolve around the latest games.

query: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different areas of interest. Could you help me find the latest news articles from various sources? I'd like to browse recent content from developer communities like dev.to and check out climate change coverage from around the world. I'm also curious about US-specific AI-generated news and would appreciate seeing the most recent 50 global news articles. While you're at it, can you pull the latest updates from the movie industry and show me what news categories are available? I'd also be interested in reading Arabic news from CNN, learning about different news publishers, and catching up on general news from Great Britain.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: Find the latest news articles from various sources. I'm interested in seeing recent content from developer communities like dev.to, climate change news from around the world, US-specific AI-generated news, the most recent 50 global news articles, latest movie industry updates, available news categories, Arabic news from CNN, information about news publishers, and general news from Great Britain.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different areas of interest. Could you help me find the latest news articles from various sources? I'd like to browse recent content from developer communities like dev.to and check out climate change coverage from around the world. I'm also curious about US-specific AI-generated news and would appreciate seeing the most recent 50 global news articles. While you're at it, can you pull the latest updates from the movie industry and show me what news categories are available? I'd also be interested in reading Arabic news from CNN, learning about different news publishers, and catching up on general news from Great Britain.
hard_rewrite: I've been feeling out of touch with what's happening in the world lately. I wonder what the developer community on dev.to is discussing these days? And with all the extreme weather events, I should probably catch up on environmental developments globally. I'm also curious how AI is shaping news reporting in the US. It would be nice to get a broad overview of what's happening - maybe about 50 recent headlines from around the world would help me catch up. The film industry always has interesting developments too. What news categories are typically available when browsing news sites? I've been trying to improve my Arabic and would love to see what CNN is reporting in that language. Who are the main publishers delivering news these days? And since I have friends in Great Britain, I should probably check what's happening there as well.

query: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different areas. Could you help me gather the latest news by pulling the main page headlines from BizToc and retrieving this week's top articles from dev.to? I'd also like to see about 10 English sports headlines from US sources using News API. While you're at it, would you mind including some Arabic news from Alarabiya and the latest updates from the anime world? I'm also doing some political research, so could you identify the key Republican and Democratic figures from the 2020 US election (just page 1 for each party)? Finally, I'd appreciate if you could collect all relevant dev.to articles and show me what news sources are available through BizToc.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: Find the latest news from multiple sources. First, get the main page headlines from BizToc. Then retrieve the top weekly articles from dev.to. Also fetch English sports headlines from the US using News API (limit to 10 results). Include Arabic news from Alarabiya and the latest anime news. Additionally, show key Republican and Democratic figures from the 2020 US election (page 1 for both). Finally, get all relevant dev.to articles and list the available news sources from BizToc.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to catch up on current events across different areas. Could you help me gather the latest news by pulling the main page headlines from BizToc and retrieving this week's top articles from dev.to? I'd also like to see about 10 English sports headlines from US sources using News API. While you're at it, would you mind including some Arabic news from Alarabiya and the latest updates from the anime world? I'm also doing some political research, so could you identify the key Republican and Democratic figures from the 2020 US election (just page 1 for each party)? Finally, I'd appreciate if you could collect all relevant dev.to articles and show me what news sources are available through BizToc.
hard_rewrite: I'm curious about what's happening in the world today. Could you paint a picture of the current media landscape? I'd like to see what's trending on that business-focused aggregator site with the main page highlights. Also, what topics are developers discussing most this week? For sports enthusiasts in America, what English-language stories are making headlines? I'm also interested in Middle Eastern perspectives - what's being reported in Arabic? And for my anime-loving friend, what's the latest from Japan? On a different note, I've been reflecting on the 2020 election - who were the key figures representing both major political parties? Finally, what conversations are happening in the developer community right now, and which news sources does that business aggregator site pull from?

It would be great if you could show me the various categories on Moka News that cover over 30 global sources. Finally, can you search for 'climate change' articles in English across the News Network global database?

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: I'm researching news across multiple topics and sources. First, I need COVID-19 news updates from both the United States and France. Then, I want to explore LGBTQ+ news from around the world. I'm also interested in learning about movie news sources and the latest news from India Today. Additionally, I need Arabic news from both CNN Arabic and France24 Arabic. Finally, I'm researching the 2020 U.S. election and need information about Republican voices, Democratic voices, and past election events.
simple_rewrite: I'm working on a global news research project and need to gather information from various sources. Could you help me find recent COVID-19 updates from both the US and France? I'd also like to explore some LGBTQ+ coverage from around the world. While you're at it, can you recommend some reliable movie news sources? I'm curious about the latest headlines from India Today as well. For my section on Arabic media, I need content from both CNN Arabic and France24 Arabic. Lastly, my project includes a segment on American politics, so I'm looking for information about Republican and Democratic perspectives on the 2020 U.S. election, along with some notable events from that electoral cycle.
hard_rewrite: I've been following global developments lately and need to build a comprehensive media landscape. I'm curious how different regions are handling the pandemic - particularly comparing North American and European responses. Also, I'm interested in understanding diverse perspectives on social issues around the world. Could you help me find some entertainment industry coverage sources? I'm also trying to keep up with what's happening on the subcontinent. For my language studies, I need to compare news coverage in both English and Arabic from major international networks. And I've been reflecting on the political divisions from recent years - especially understanding the different voices and significant moments from the last major electoral cycle.

query: I'm trying to stay on top of global news trends, especially in the crypto space. Could you pull together a comprehensive news overview for me? I'd like to see the ALL Crypto News Feed for cryptocurrency updates and Twitter's crypto feed specifically. Also, I'm interested in checking out the latest business headlines from BizToc's main page. Beyond that, I want to broaden my perspective with some international coverage - specifically news from Arabic sources like Alarabiya and RT Arabic, some India-related updates from India Today, and general world news from Moka News. Finally, to help me organize my news sources better, could you show me the available region lists from both the News Network and AI News Global services, along with all the source IDs available from BizToc?

tool_list.tool description: Retrieves news articles based on a specified tag. This endpoint is part of the India Today Unofficial API, a third-party web service that provides access to news content from the India Today platform. It leverages the API's database of articles, videos, and images to deliver curated news tailored to the selected tag, enabling developers to integrate topic-specific news into their applications. Unlike official channels, this tool offers flexible access to India Today's content through a developer-friendly interface, though it is not affiliated with or endorsed by India Today itself.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: I need a comprehensive overview of the latest news across multiple sources. Please retrieve the ALL Crypto News Feed for cryptocurrency updates, get Twitter's crypto feed specifically, and show me the latest business news from BizToc's main page. Additionally, I'd like to see news from Arabic sources including Alarabiya and RT Arabic, India-related news from India Today, and world news from Moka News. Finally, provide me with available region lists from both the News Network and AI News Global services, and show all available source IDs from BizToc.
simple_rewrite: I'm trying to stay on top of global news trends, especially in the crypto space. Could you pull together a comprehensive news overview for me? I'd like to see the ALL Crypto News Feed for cryptocurrency updates and Twitter's crypto feed specifically. Also, I'm interested in checking out the latest business headlines from BizToc's main page. Beyond that, I want to broaden my perspective with some international coverage - specifically news from Arabic sources like Alarabiya and RT Arabic, some India-related updates from India Today, and general world news from Moka News. Finally, to help me organize my news sources better, could you show me the available region lists from both the News Network and AI News Global services, along with all the source IDs available from BizToc?
hard_rewrite: I've been trying to stay informed about what's happening around the world. I wonder what kind of financial and digital currency updates are circulating today? Also, I'm curious about what's being reported in Middle Eastern media outlets like Alarabiya and RT. And what about the latest developments in India? I'd like to get a broader perspective on global events too. By the way, I'm interested in knowing which geographic regions have news coverage available through different networks, and what sources BizToc pulls from for their business updates.

query: I'm trying to catch up on different news topics for a research project. Could you first pull up information about currently active federal politicians in Ontario? After that, I'd like to see the 5 most recent news stories coming out of the Philippines. Also, I'm interested in finding any movie news articles related to 'Dune'. While we're at it, can you share the latest global coronavirus updates? Finally, I'd appreciate if you could check the most recent headlines from BBC Arabic.

task_description: This task involves an agent proactively gathering the latest news and updates on a recurring basis (e.g., daily) based on a user's pre-defined set of interests. The agent queries multiple specialized, real-time news sources and consolidates the findings into a personalized briefing.
refined_query: I'm looking for a diverse set of news and information from various sources. I want to explore cryptocurrency blog posts, LGBTQ+ news from around the world, Greek news in English, and detailed articles from Indonesian news sources like Kompas (specifically article .xml.2023.06.20.114935178). I'm also interested in Cameroon news related to diplomatic relations, past events from the 2020 U.S. election (page 1), the latest NFT news, a specific Malaysian Kini article (SID: 565154), business news from Indonesia, and information about a particular politician with Goverlytics ID 437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190. Please gather this information for me to review.

I'd also like to explore LGBTQ+ news from different countries and check out some Greek news sources that publish in English. I'm particularly interested in an Indonesian article from Kompas with the reference number xml.2023.06.20.114935178. Additionally, could you pull up some Cameroon news focusing on diplomatic relations, and look back at coverage from page 1 of the 2020 U.S. election? I'd also appreciate the latest updates on NFT trends, a specific article from Malaysian Kini (SID: 565154), some business reporting from Indonesia, and information about a politician with Goverlytics ID 437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190. This would give me a comprehensive view for my research.
hard_rewrite: I've been exploring different perspectives lately and would love to broaden my information sources. I'm fascinated by digital currency discussions and wondering what's happening in those blog circles. Also, I'm researching global LGBTQ+ developments for a project. I'm curious about what's happening in Greece but my Greek is rusty - are there English sources? There was this fascinating article about flood prevention in Bandung with retention ponds (I think from June 20th this year) that I'd like to revisit. I'm also researching African international relations, particularly Cameroon's diplomatic connections. For a retrospective piece, I need to look back at what happened during that first week of October 2020 in American politics. The digital art market intrigues me too - what's happening there lately? There was also this Malaysian health report about COVID cases (story #565154) that contained important statistics. I'm looking for Indonesian business insights, and I need background on a Vancouver councillor named Rebecca for a local government analysis.
